title.rendered: CONGRATULATION SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF WATERPOINT PROJECT

content.rendered:
Enormous efforts and determination of Newtecons Site Management Team have made up  a modern technical infrastructure system at  Waterpoint project.

Located in Ben Luc, Long An, Waterpoint project boasts a living environment close to the nature, rivers and provide residents with a wide variety of facilities to live, study, work and entertain comfortably as in satellite urban models in the world.

Technical infrastructure works implemented by the Project Team help to connect residential communities in the whole area. The newly builds straight roads will connect schools, hospitals and other urban areas in the future.

Once again, congratulations to all project team.
